lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 27 (U.P.) -- General Sir Archibald Wavell, it was revealed by an authoritative British source today, will confer with Soviet representatives at Teheran on "joint defense of that part of the world."
abstract: Wavell mission in joint Brit-USSR Caucasus defense confirmed by London

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
